CULL_THE_DISHONORABLE.NAME: Cull the Dishonorable
CULL_THE_DISHONORABLE.DESC: Deal double damage and gain +3 to rolls against enemies with Dishonorable.

DEATH_BEFORE_DISHONOR.NAME: Death before Dishonor
DEATH_BEFORE_DISHONOR.DESC: If this unit would gain Dishonorable, remove Dishonorable and Stagger this unit.

IN_MEMORIAM.NAME: In Memoriam
IN_MEMORIAM.DESC:
When an ally is defeated, this unit permanently gains an additional action per round.

If no other allies remain, remove all Stagger effects from this unit, and this unit recovers all HP and Poise.

SACRED_DUEL.NAME: Sacred Duel
SACRED_DUEL.DESC: [color=#4cf]On combat start[/color]: Inflict Duel to the Death to a random enemy that does not have Duel to the Death.
